輴字的基本解释

輴
chūn
灵车：“曾子攀柩车，引輴者为之止也。”
古代行泥泞道路的一种交通工具。

輴字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chūn］
［《廣韻》丑倫切，平諄，徹。］
(1)古代载柩车。
(2)古代用于泥泞路上的交通工具。
(3)见“輴輴”。

輴字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【車字部】　輴； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页1246第17
【廣韻】丑倫切【集韻】【韻會】敕倫切【等韻】丑屯切，?音椿。【廣韻】載柩車也。【禮·檀弓】菆塗龍輴。【註】輴車載柩，而畫龍爲楯，故曰龍輴。　又泥行所乗也。【書·益稷子乗四載註】泥乗輴，以板爲之，其狀如箕，擿行泥上。【史記·河渠書】作橇。【漢書·溝洫志】作毳。　又【禮·喪大記】大夫葬用輴。【註】輴，當爲輇車之輇。◎按《玉篇》輴與䡅同，不與輇同。輇與輲同。諸書多混纏眯目，附記於此。

考證：〔【禮·喪大記】大夫葬同輴。〕　謹照原文同改用。
輴字的源字形

輴字的起名意思

暂无。

輴
Basic explanation of words
輴
chūn
Hearse: "Zengzi climbs the hearse, and the one who attracts the rider will stop it."
A means of transportation on muddy roads in ancient times.
輴
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［chūn］
["Guangyun" is ugly and cut, flat and thorough. ]
(1) Ancient Hearing Car.
(2) Ancient vehicles used on muddy roads.
(3) See "輴輴".
輴
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 2] [Car Character Department] 　輴; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 1246 Page 17
[Guang Yun] Chou Lun cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Chi Lun cut [Wai Yun] Chou Tun cut,? Yin Chun. [Guang Yun] Carrying the hearse too. 【Rite·Tan Gong】The dragon is painted with dragon. [Note] The lorry is a car, and the dragon is painted, so it is called a dragon.　It is also used by the mud line. 【Book·Yijizi multiplying four-year note】The mud multiplying the mud, taking the board as it, its shape is like a skip, and it is moved on the mud. 【Historical Records·Hequ Book】As a sled. [Han Shu·Gou Xun Zhi] Composed.　[Ritual and Funeral Records] The doctor's funeral. [Note] 輴, regarded as the wheel of a car. ◎According to "Jade Pian", it is the same as the same, not the same as the one.辁 and 輲 are the same. Many books are mixed with squinting eyes, attached here. Textual research: [[Ritual·Mourning Records] The doctor was buried together. 〕 　 I would like to use the same as the original.
